price: Au wanasema: Ana wazimu? Bali amewajia kwa Haki, na wengi wao wanaichukia Haki.
arabic: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ بِهِۦ جِنَّةُۢۚ بَلۡ جَآءَهُم بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَأَكۡثَرُهُمۡ لِلۡحَقِّ كَٰرِهُونَ
footnotes: Au wanasema kuwa huyu ni mwendawazimu? Hasha! Huyu hakika kawaletea Dini ya Haki, na wengi wao wanaichukia haki, kwani hiyo ni kinyume na matamanio yao na mapenzi yao, basi kwa hivyo hawamuamini.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: am yaqūlūna bihi jinnatun bal jāahum bil-ḥaqi wa-aktharuhum lil'ḥaqqi kārihūna
